#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
#include<stack>
#include<map>
#include<string.h>
#define STOP system("pause")
#define CASE int t;scanf("%d",&t);while(t--)
#define LLI long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{   
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    LLI a[100000];
    int i,negative=0,neg=0,pos=0,zero=0,min=100000;
    for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
    {
            scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
            if(a[i]==0)
            zero++;
            else if(a[i]<0)
            negative++;  
            else
            pos++;
            if(min>(pos-negative)&&i!=n)
            min=pos-negative;      
    }
    if(negative==n||(pos==n))
    printf("1\n");
    else
    printf("%d\n",(min+zero+negative));
    return 0; 
}
